body:
Hello @JustinZhengBC! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/dtypes/cast.py`](https://github.com/JustinZhengBC/pandas/blob/538fee06e1abb02870b14e6d2dd6bfad8cf4448a/pandas/core/dtypes/cast.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/frame/test_constructors.py`](https://github.com/JustinZhengBC/pandas/blob/538fee06e1abb02870b14e6d2dd6bfad8cf4448a/pandas/tests/frame/test_constructors.py) !
Looks pretty good. Can you add a whatsnew note for v0.24?
I updated the whatsnew for v0.24. Also, after reverting to master, I found that while passing "int64" as the dtype caused the bug, merely passing int did not. I have updated the test to reflect this.
